amendment.description: To improve maritime container security by ensuring that foreign ports participating in the Container Security Initiative scan all containers shipped to the United States for nuclear and radiological weapons before loading.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 4930 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 37. Record Vote Number: 248.
Motion to table amendment SA 4930 made in Senate.

Amendment SA 4930 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S9332-9333; text: CR S9332) To improve maritime container security by ensuring that foreign ports participating in the Container Security Initiative scan all containers shipped to the United States for nuclear and radiological weapons before loading.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 4930 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 37. Record Vote Number: 248.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4930 proposed by Senator Schumer.
